title.native: ハピネスチャージプリキュア！

description:
All around the world, Pretty Cures have been fighting against the invasion of an enemy known as Saiark. Shirayuki Hime, the princess of Blue Sky Kingdom, is a Pretty Cure; but unable to defeat the enemy alone, she falls behind the others, and ends up in a bad situation.
On her quest to find a partner, she meets Aino Megumi (Cure Lovely), and the two join forces to battle the enemy together. They learn that by assembling all PreCards, you can get any one wish fulfilled, and they team up with the fairy Ribbon to protect world peace, transform, and dress up as they fight!
A new Pretty Cure story with a dress-up theme begins!

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Kids
tags.description: Target demographic is young children.

tags.name: Superhero
tags.description: Prominently features super-powered humans who aim to serve the greater good.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Tokusatsu
tags.description: Prominently features elements that resemble special effects in Japanese live-action shows

tags.name: Card Battle
tags.description: Centers around individuals competing in card games.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Primarily Child Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters below a high school age.

tags.name: Cosplay
tags.description: Features dressing up as a different character or profession.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Shrine Maiden
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a shrine maiden.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/129893119)

Tatsuya Nagamine is an anime director affiliated with [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/).

__Height:__ 159 cm 

She was a former AKB48 member (Team A) who graduated from the group on February 6th, 2013 to concentrate on her career as a seiyuu

[Agency Profile](http://amuleto.jp/talents/yoshidahitomi.html) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/happy-mipyoko-life/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/hiTomi_713)

__Height:__ 155 cm

Member of the duet [Blue Drops](https://anilist.co/staff/106305/Blue-Drops) with [Saori Hayami](https://anilist.co/staff/95869/Saori-Hayami).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/高橋ナツコ)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/193091/)._

Mitsuka is an animator, storyboarder, episode director, and director currently working at Toei Animation.
